thread.title: Jason Aldean 2025 tickets: Best prices, cities, dates for 'Full Throttle' Tour with Nate Smith and more - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Jason Aldean 2025 tickets: Best prices, cities, dates for 'Full Throttle' Tour with Nate Smith and more - NewsBreak

author: Daniel Yanofsky
title: Jason Aldean 2025 tickets: Best prices, cities, dates for 'Full Throttle' Tour with Nate Smith and more - NewsBreak
text:
By Daniel Yanofsky ,
1 hours ago
Jason Aldean has become quite a force in the music industry. The country music singer is ready to take his talents on the road in 2025 when he starts the "Full Throttle" North American tour.
Aldean signed a massive record deal with Broken Bow Records in 2005, and his first album, titled his name, made it to the top ten on the Billboard country charts. Since then, he has earned platinum status on several albums, including "Night Train," "Wide Open," and "Old Boots, New Dirt."
The 47-year-old has been nominated for five Grammy Awards and has won multiple CMA and ACM Awards. He reached superstardom when "Try That In A Small Town" reached the top of the Billboard Hot 100, a song that has gained notoriety amidst its controversy. Regardless, his dedicated fans go crazy for every strum of his guitar.
Aldean will be joined on the tour by Nate Smith, RaeLynn, and Dee Jay Silver and will co-headline an event with Brooks & Dunn. It leads to an upcoming album he believes will be well-received.
BUY NOW: Jason Aldean tickets for every 2025 show
"We got a new one on the album, it's just a powerful type of song that people are going to relate to, and it has nothing to do with politics or any of those things," Aldean said via Hook & Barrel .
The Sporting News has everything you need to know to grab tickets to one of Jason Aldean's upcoming shows.
Jason Aldean tickets for 2025 'Full Throttle' Tour StubHub Tickets for Jason Aldean's "Full Throttle" Tour are already available on StubHub.
The first show, at Ohio's Blossom Music Center on May 23, has ticket prices starting at $38 , with prices reaching $3,449. A May 30 show at Fenway Park has tickets starting at $56 .
A July 17 show at the BOK Center in Oklahoma has tickets starting at $46 , with prices reaching $8,972. Meanwhile, a September 25 show at the Cajundome has ticket prices starting at $48 , with prices reaching $8,972.
Jason Aldean 'Full Throttle' Tour 2025 cities, dates The "Full Throttle" tour begins in Ohio on May 23. Following an event in Boston, Jason Aldean heads to the Tailgate N' Tallboys on June 7.
Through the summer, Aldean will visit Oklahoma, Arkansas, Missouri, New Mexico, Colorado, and more. He heads to Canada for part of the tour, with an appearance at Big Valley Jamboree on August 3.
Aldean goes to the Cajundome September 25 and ends his tour in October with two events in Florida.
Below is a complete schedule of cities and dates for the "Full Throttle" tour. You can see the cheapest seats available for every date right here .
